description: '''Anatolian rock''' ({{langx|tr|Anadolu rock}}), or '''Turkish psychedelic rock''', is a fusion of [[Turkish folk music]] and [[rock music|rock]]. It emerged during the mid-1960s, soon after rock groups became popular in [[Turkey]]. The most widely known members of this genre include Turkish musicians [[Barış Manço]], [[Cem Karaca]], [[Erkin Koray]], [[Selda Bağcan]], [[Fikret Kızılok]] alongside bands such as [[Moğollar]].
